result.arabic_text: إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
result.translation: 55. Verily, The worst of moving (living) creatures before Allâh are those who disbelieve[1], - so they shall not believe.
result.footnotes: (V.8:55) i.e. disbelieve in their Lord (Allâh), deny His Oneness, worship others besides Him, deny His Messengers, and believe not in the Divine Revelation.
